name: Canvas Departure
description:
Canvas Departure is a platform game where the player is constantly running alongside his reflection on  the water, avoiding all the obstacles. 

There are some power-ups across the map which will help the player and his reflection to complete his objective. 

Power-Ups:

Teleport - Teleports the player and it's reflection to the oposite gravity force.

Extra Jump - Grants the player the ability to make an adicional jump.

Gravity Swap - Changes the gravity to the oposite force.

Dash - Grants the ability to make a quick dash forward

Controls:

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Dash

Created by:

António Barreiro - Programmer

José Graça - Programmer

Joana Pimenta - Programmer

Manuel Milhazes - Art & Sound
